job_title: PCT Patient Care Tech in Meriden, CT
pros: BEST RN's in the world!! Best team I have ever worked with. Very friendly and helpful co-workers.
cons: Nurse Manager for my floor was cut throat. I was fired for having "excessive absences", which was 3 in 6 months. However, I had covid and lingering symptoms. After the first write up, I came to work ill, where I was informed I could not work sick because I endangered my coworkers and staff, and was sent home. Upon my return I was written up again even though they sent me home because I WAS SICK. The third one happened 3 months later, a sinus infection, and a dr note. I literally could barely breathe. No consideration for the fact I had picked up many shifts to help when they were short.

This place is toxic. It is not what you know but who you know., There is something not kosher when overtime is promised to 1 person and no one else can get any. Some people are mean and will harass you daily.

pros: Great support from management, excellent opportunities for growth and development. Patient care is top notch! Great staff to work with.
